QuestData.Title: Deeper into the Woods
QuestData.Description:
We need to go deeper into the forest. The witches are clearly up to something even worse than I'd imagined.
As much as I have a duty to return to Lady Lucille with Master Ashton, I also have a duty to find out more about this threat to our people, and stop it if I can.
Going further into the forest is not without risk, but I believe it is one worth taking.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel with Cleardawn, Ashton, and Webb deeper into the forest.
QuestData.RewardText: By my ancestors' anchors that is a large army! At least it doesn't appear to be mobile yet. And the tree... Clearly it is the focus of their efforts.
